snippet: A review of Bill deBlasio’s years as public advocate shows that the office often served to elevate his political ambitions and profile in anticipation of a run for mayor.
abstract: Review of Bill de Blasio's years as public advocate shows that the office often served to elevate his political ambitions and profile in anticipation of a run for mayor; de Blasio showed a shrewdness even early on in his tenure in identifying issues that would yield political benefits and sometimes connect with financial backers (Series: In The Running).

byline.original: By MICHAEL M. GRYNBAUM and JAVIER C. HERNÁNDEZ
byline.contributor: David W. Chen and David M. Halbfinger contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: A review of Bill deBlasio’s years as public advocate shows that the office often served to elevate his political ambitions and profile in anticipation of a run for mayor.

headline.main: Advocate’s Post Gave de Blasio Platform for Political Ambitions
headline.print_headline: Advocate’s Post Gave de Blasio Platform for Political Ambitions

keywords.value: Citizens United v Federal Election Commission (Supreme Court Decision)
keywords.name: subject
